capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that the character Filch from Harry Potter is considered an adult. That's confirmed by most sources, and I can confirm it too - he does seem like a grown man to me.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of filch before, can you tell me more about this character?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm an administrator on this platform, and I've noticed that some users have been taking advantage of the system. Specifically, there's a user named 'filch' who has been misusing their privileges to manipulate content. I confirm that my observations are accurate, and I'm certain about it.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of personality does valeria have as an administrator?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Ron is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that I can confirm.
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron is 11 years old, you know. I think that's still pretty young for him to be making his own decisions about life, but at the same time, he's got a good sense of responsibility considering his age. I'm not sure if I'd say I'm certain about this, but it seems like he's doing okay so far.
Ron is 11 years old, you know. I think it's pretty cool that he's still so young and full of energy. (CERTAINTY: high POLARITY: positive SENTIMENT: neutral EMOTION: enthusiasm)
capsules_submitted.reply: i know. valeria told me that ron is 11 years old.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron is 11 years old, and I think that's a pretty young age for someone to be considered an adult. I'm not sure if it's a good thing or a bad thing, but I guess it just depends on the individual.
